paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from the study of metastatic breast cancer.

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic breast cancer with loss of heterozygosity of the BRCA2 mutation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Truncal mutations (defined as mutations present in all subclones and timepoints) in patient #1 included loss of heterozygosity of the patient’s germline BRCA2 E1493fs mutation.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 mutation is associated with loss of heterozygosity, indicating a potential loss of function.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was noted in the context of a truncal mutation in a patient with metastatic breast cancer.
key_quotes: loss of heterozygosity of the patient’s germline BRCA2 E1493fs mutation

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic breast cancer with loss of heterozygosity of the BRCA2 mutation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient #2 possessed a germline heterozygous BRCA2 E49* mutation that underwent loss of heterozygosity in the patient’s cancer.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 mutation is associated with loss of heterozygosity, indicating a potential loss of function.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was noted in the context of a truncal mutation in a patient with metastatic breast cancer.
key_quotes: germline heterozygous BRCA2 E49* mutation that underwent loss of heterozygosity

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic breast cancer with a BRCA2 reversion mutation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This patient possessed a germline BRCA2 inactivating (V643fs) mutation, and relatively few truncal mutations.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 mutation is associated with loss of heterozygosity, indicating a potential loss of function.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was noted in the context of a truncal mutation in a patient with metastatic breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: All extracted variants were confirmed to be in the BRCA2 gene.
